page.title: 08WOODHOUSES
page.content: { Woodhouses}is a small village in a rural setting which has managed to keep its individuality and feeling of a semi-rural community. The original part of the village is protected by a conservation order and modernisation of property must be in keeping with local building materials. The village has a butchers shop and Post Office which is also a general store. The{church}plays an important part in the community. As well as a thriving Sunday School and weekly church services, many other activities are organised - Ladies' keep fit, a youth club and over 60's club. The church hall also serves as a rehearsal room. Woodhouses Operative & Dramatic society stage their annual productions here.{Dances and barbeques}are also held regularly. Golf, cricket,riding, bowling and football are local sports.
